articles.author: Tom Rabe, Matt Wade
articles.title: Record housing prices spur Perrottet to deliver stamp duty reform - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: NSW Treasurer Dominic Perrottet has seized on record high Sydney housing prices as proof sweeping changes to the state’s property tax system must be introduced as soon as possible.
articles.content:
The Treasurer said stamp duty was a prohibitive tax for prospective buyers whose saving efforts were already being outpaced by record growth.
When you see the time it takes for young people to save … [+3100 chars]
